prompt:
Extract the questions verbatim from {{file_names}}, Do not use any other resources. Do not paraphrase. Continue a question until the next top-level number (^\d+[.)-)\s). Ignore headers/footers like Generated on… Page…. Also make sure to extract the marks given in the paper. If marks for each question is given use that if total marks is given divide that amongst the questions and give the marks for each question.

Handling sub-questions:
If a question has sub-parts (e.g., 1(a), 1(b), 1(c)), keep it as one question in the output.
If marks are given for each sub-part, use exactly those marks.
If only a total mark is given, allocate marks across sub-parts using judgement.

Output only JSON: [{'Question number', 'Question text', 'Marks'}].
